Uses of Class
API.ADK.DeviceInformation

    • Uses of DeviceInformation in API.ADK

      Methods in API.ADK with parameters of type DeviceInformation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ReturnCode Driver.CANDevice.readCANblueHardwareNumber(DeviceInformation deviceInformation)
      Read the hardware number of the CANblue device.
      ReturnCode Driver.CANDevice.readCANblueProtocol(DeviceInformation deviceInformation)
      Read the protocol version of the CANblue device.
      ReturnCode Driver.CANDevice.readCANblueVersion(DeviceInformation deviceInformation)
      Read the Firmware version of the CANblue device.
      ReturnCode API_ADK.Device.readDeviceInformation(DeviceInformation deviceInformation)
      Return the information about the device, such as Firmware version, Protocol Version, and Hardware Number.
      ReturnCode Driver.CANDevice.readDeviceProtocol(DeviceInformation deviceInformation)
      Read the protocol version of the Device.
      ReturnCode Driver.CANDevice.readDeviceVersion(DeviceInformation deviceInformation)
      Read the Firmware version of the Device.
      ReturnCode Driver.CANDevice.readHardwareNumber(DeviceInformation deviceInformation)
      Read the hardware number of the Device.
